text: Mildred "Millie" Jackson (born July 15, 1944) is an American R&B; singer and songwriter. She released her first album in 1972. In 1974 Jackson was nominated for a Grammy Award. In 2000 she sung on some songs for the soundtrack of a French movie called Comme un aimant. In 2008 she played Claudette in a movie called Soul Men. ==Personal life== Jackson has a daughter called Keisha Jackson. She is also a singer. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:American singer-songwriters Category:African-American musicians Category:Living people
title: Millie Jackson
